string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Creates a new basic activity with an app bar.
Creates a new Activity with a Navigation Drawer.
Creates a new blank activity,with an action bar and navigational elements such as tabs or horizontal swipe.
Creates a new activity that toggles the visibility of the system UI and action bar upon user interaction.
Creates a new login activity,allowing users to optionally sign in with Google+ or enter an email address and password to log in to or register with your application.
Creates a new vertical scrolling activity.
Creates a new application settings activity that presents alternative layouts on handset and tablet-size screens.

resources.string:
